title: India second-biggest Russian fossil fuel buyer after China
description: India significantly increased its purchase of Russian fossil fuels in November. This surge placed India as the second-largest importer, following China. The rise was fueled by higher imports of crude oil, coal, and refined oil products. This comes as the United States continues to pressure India to reduce these purchases.

title: Remarkable journey: chasing the secrets of Nepal’s ancient 'mad honey' harvest
description: Years after a striking National Geographic image captivated her, Limor Zadok reached the Himalayan cliffs herself, photographing the perilous, centuries-old honey-hunting tradition practiced deep in Nepal’s jungles

title: Before megalodon, researchers say a monstrous shark ruled ancient Australian seas
description: In the age of dinosaurs — before whales, great whites or the bus-sized megalodon — a monstrous shark prowled the waters off what's now northern Australia, among the sea monsters of the Cretaceous period.Researchers studying huge vertebrae discovered on a beach near the city of Darwin...

title: Before megalodon, researchers say a monstrous shark ruled ancient Australian seas
description: In the age of dinosaurs — before whales, great whites or the bus-sized megalodon — a monstrous shark prowled the waters off what's now northern Australia, among the sea monsters of the Cretaceous period.
